BigGroupPM Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for BigGroupPM:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 addItem ($row, $quantity, $priceObj)

Detailed Description

Elaborate set matching; can require up to 11 separate items Qualifying item(s) have a mixmatch code with a matching 'stem' plus '_qX' (e.g., mmitemstem_q0, mmitemstem_q1, etc) Discount item has the same stem plus '_d' (e.g, mmitemstem_d)

Customer has to buy one item from each qualifying group as well as an item from the discount group.
